table.search-info: Please enter the value you want to search for.

modal.title: Edit Account
modal.add-info: Please select the company before creating a new account under the company. If the company cannot be found, please register the company first.
modal.select-company-info: Please enter the name of the company you would like to find. If the company does not exist, register the company below in ‘Register new company’.

firstStep.title: Personal Information
firstStep.description: Please enter the information of the person in charge. The information can be edited after the account has been created.

secondStep.title: Email notifications
secondStep.description: You can choose which notifications you would like to receive via email. It is recommended that you receive all notifications from the platform as you will be notified of important updates. This setting can be changed after the account has been created.
secondStep.report-info: Notifications related to analysis status and report generation.

modal.data-not-found: There is no data to display.
modal.add-company-info: Please upload the required files to request a new company registration. After the request has been submitted an email will be sent after the review has been completed.
modal.report-info: We will send you notifications when analysis is complete, report is generated, report is scheduled to be deleted, and report has been deleted.
modal.general-info: We will send you inquiries and account-related notifications.
add-complete-info: An email has been sent regarding the initial log in process.
if you did not receive an email.

status.title: Account Status
info: Deactivating the account means that the user can no longer access the platform.
Reseting the password will send an email to the user to reset a new password.
Once you click ‘logout’, the user will be logged out of the platform immediately.

modal.duplicate-success: The ID is available and can be used.
modal.duplicate-check: Please check if the ID is availble to use
modal.name: Name
modal.id-exist: This ID is already taken. Please register with a different ID.
modal.email-exist: This email address is already in use. Please register with a different email.
modal.logout-success: The account has been logged out
modal.logout-failure-info: Logout failed. Please try again later.
modal.password-reset-failure-info: Password reset failed. Please try again later.
modal.status-failure-info: Failed to change account status. Please try again later.
modal.update-success: Your account has been successfully edited.

update.info: Would you like to save your modifications?

modal.password-reset-confirm: Would you like to reset the password for this account?
modal.logout-confirm: Would you like to log out of your account?
modal.inactive-confirm: Would you like to change this account to inactive status?
modal.active-confirm: Would you like to change this account to active status?

id.matches: Spaces and special characters cannot be entered.

phone.matches: Please enter the correct contact number.
